sentences.en: "Let us pray," said the Methodist chaplain.
sentences.cn: “我们来祈祷吧，”那个循道宗牧师说。

sentences.en: And what, pray, do you buy and sell, Major?
sentences.cn: 梅杰，请问，你都买卖些什么？

sentences.en: I beg your pardon, pray continue.
I hope and pray that this is a misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 我非常希望这是个误会。

sentences.en: In times of difficulty, she pray for an oracle to guide her.
sentences.cn: 在困难的时候, 她祈祷神谕来指引她.

sentences.en: One can only pray that the team's manager learns something from it.
sentences.cn: 大家也只能希冀球队教练从中汲取教训。

sentences.en: Paul was praying that no one had noticed his absence.
sentences.cn: 保罗但愿没有人注意到他的缺席。

sentences.en: She went to pray for the soul of her late husband.
sentences.cn: 她去为亡夫的灵魂祈祷。

sentences.en: They visited the Shrine of Our Lady to pray for redemption.
sentences.cn: 他们参观了圣母马利亚的神龛,为赎罪而祈祷.

sentences.en: They went to the mosque to pray.
to pray for the salvation of the world
We have a beautiful city and we pray it stays that way.
sentences.cn: 我们的城市很美丽，但愿它能保持下去。

sentences.en: We pray to God to deliver us from evil.
sentences.cn: 我们祈求上帝把我们从罪恶中拯救出来.

sentences.en: We pray you to set the child free.
sentences.cn: 我们恳求你放了这个孩子.

sentences.en: We’re praying for good weather tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们企盼明天会是好天气。

sentences.en: Will you pray to Our Lady for me?
sentences.cn: 你能为我向圣母马利亚祈祷吗？

trans.tran_cn: 祈祷， 祈求； 请求， 恳求
trans.tran_en: to speak to God in order to ask for help or give thanks

trans.tran_cn: 祈祷，祷告，请求，恳求，央求
